medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that 4 days ago, she began to develop sharp sided abdominal pain, which continued to worsen, associated with bloating and constipation. She experienced episodes of diarrhea/constipation and has decreased appetite, nausea, and weight loss of four pounds over the last week. She endorsed fevers and chills, with a measured temperature up to 101. Her belly pain is relieved by laying on her stomach or side.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Leiomyoma of uterus, allergic rhinitis, urticaria, vitamin D deficiency, iron deficiency anemia, one prior miscarriage.
medical_history.family_history: + CAD, sarcoid (mother); + lung cancer (maternal aunt); + lupus (sister).
